description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期曹魏重要将领，曹操的堂弟。因其吝啬曾得罪曹丕，一度被下狱免官，后得卞太后求情赦免。官至骠骑将军，死后谥为恭侯。
description.en: An important general of Cao Wei during the late Eastern Han Dynasty and the Three Kingdoms period, and a cousin of Cao Cao. Due to his stinginess, he offended Cao Pi and was once imprisoned and dismissed from office, but was later pardoned after Empress Dowager Bian interceded. He reached the rank of General of Chariots and Cavalry and was posthumously honored as Marquis Gong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏的奠基者。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han Dynasty who laid the foundation for the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的第二位皇帝。
description.en: The second emperor of the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的堂弟，曹洪的亲弟弟，虎豹骑的统帅之一。
description.en: A cousin of Cao Cao, the younger brother of Cao Hong, and one of the commanders of the Tiger and Leopard Cavalry.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪之子，继承了曹洪的爵位。
description.en: Son of Cao Hong, who inherited his father's title.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪之子，封为列侯。
description.en: Son of Cao Hong, enfeoffed as a marquis.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪之女，荀粲之妻。
description.en: Daughter of Cao Hong and wife of Xun Can.

description.zh-cn: 荀彧之子，玄学家。
description.en: Son of Xun Yu, a Xuanxue scholar.

description.zh-cn: 董卓的部将，曾在荥阳击败曹操。
description.en: A general under Dong Zhuo who defeated Cao Cao at Xingyang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的扬州刺史。
description.en: Inspector of Yang Province during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的谋士。
description.en: An advisor to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 原为袁绍部将，官渡之战后投降曹操，成为曹魏五子良将之一。
description.en: Originally a general under Yuan Shao, he surrendered to Cao Cao after the Battle of Guandu and became one of the Five Elite Generals of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的荆州牧。
description.en: Governor of Jing Province during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的部将。
description.en: A general under Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉五虎上将之一。
description.en: One of the Five Tiger Generals of Shu Han.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的妻子，曹丕的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Cao Cao and mother of Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕的皇后。
description.en: Empress of Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员，曾公开谴责曹洪的行为。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei who publicly condemned Cao Hong's behavior.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，曾任长社令，不畏权贵。
description.en: An official in the late Eastern Han, served as Prefect of Changshe, known for not fearing the powerful.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏将领，曾任许县令，执法严明。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei, served as Prefect of Xu, known for his strict enforcement of the law.

description.zh-cn: 建安七子之一，文学家。
description.en: One of the Seven Scholars of Jian'an, a man of letters.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏权臣，西晋的奠基者。
description.en: A powerful minister of Cao Wei and the founder of the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员，以执法不阿闻名。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei known for his impartial law enforcement.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继西汉之后的大一统王朝。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Western Han.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期北方的政权，由曹丕建立。
description.en: A state in northern China during the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 东汉沛国下辖县，今安徽省亳州市。
description.en: A county under Pei Kingdom in the Eastern Han dynasty, located in modern-day Bozhou, Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年，关东诸侯联合讨伐权臣董卓的战争。
description.en: A punitive expedition launched by a coalition of warlords against the chancellor Dong Zhuo in the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年“三大战役”之一，是曹操与袁绍之间的一场战略决战。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Battles' of the late Eastern Han, a decisive strategic battle between Cao Cao and Yuan Shao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操军与刘备军在下辨地区的一场战斗。
description.en: A battle between the forces of Cao Cao and Liu Bei in the Xiabian area.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹操麾下的重要将领，为其效力。
description.en: Cao Hong was an important general under Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，曹洪在其麾下任职。
description.en: After Cao Pi became emperor, Cao Hong served under him.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡即位后，曹洪在其麾下任职。
description.en: After Cao Rui ascended the throne, Cao Hong served under him.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹操的堂弟。
description.en: Cao Hong was Cao Cao's younger paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 曹纯是曹洪的弟弟。
description.en: Cao Chun was Cao Hong's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 曹馥是曹洪的儿子。
description.en: Cao Fu was the son of Cao Hong.

description.zh-cn: 曹震是曹洪的儿子。
description.en: Cao Zhen was the son of Cao Hong.

description.zh-cn: 曹氏是曹洪的女儿。
description.en: Lady Cao was the daughter of Cao Hong.

description.zh-cn: 曹氏是荀粲的妻子。
description.en: Lady Cao was the wife of Xun Can.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪在东汉末年开始其军事生涯。
description.en: Cao Hong began his military career in the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪是曹魏的开国功臣和重要将领。
description.en: Cao Hong was a founding contributor and important general of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪的籍贯是沛国谯县。
description.en: Cao Hong's ancestral home was Qiao County, Pei Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 在讨伐董卓之战的荥阳战斗中，徐荣击败了曹操的军队。
description.en: During the Battle of Xingyang in the campaign against Dong Zhuo, Xu Rong defeated Cao Cao's army.

description.zh-cn: 在荥阳之战中，曹操兵败失去坐骑，曹洪将自己的马让给曹操，并说出“天下可无洪，不可无公”的话，救了曹操一命。
description.en: In the Battle of Xingyang, after Cao Cao was defeated and lost his horse, Cao Hong gave his own horse to Cao Cao, saying 'The world can do without Hong, but not without you, my lord,' saving his life.

description.zh-cn: 曹洪与扬州刺史陈温有深厚的交情。
description.en: Cao Hong had a deep friendship with Chen Wen, the Inspector of Yang Province.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战中，张郃前来投降时，曹洪心存疑虑，荀攸劝说曹洪接纳了张郃。
description.en: During the Battle of Guandu, when Zhang He came to surrender, Cao Hong was suspicious. Xun You persuaded Cao Hong to accept Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战中，曹洪听从荀攸的建议，接纳了前来投降的张郃。
description.en: During the Battle of Guandu, Cao Hong followed Xun You's advice and accepted the surrender of Zhang He.

description.zh-cn: 在下辨之战中，曹洪率军击败了刘备的将领吴兰。
description.en: In the Battle of Xiabian, Cao Hong led forces to defeat Liu Bei's general Wu Lan.

description.zh-cn: 在下辨之战中，张飞意图切断曹洪军后路，但因吴兰被击败而自行退走。
description.en: In the Battle of Xiabian, Zhang Fei intended to cut off Cao Hong's retreat, but withdrew after Wu Lan was defeated.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕因年少时向曹洪借钱和借绢被拒，对此心怀怨恨。
description.en: Cao Pi held a grudge against Cao Hong for refusing to lend him money and silk in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕称帝后，借口曹洪的食客犯法，将其收监并准备处死，后虽免死但仍被削爵贬为庶民。
description.en: After becoming emperor, Cao Pi used the excuse of Cao Hong's retainer breaking the law to imprison him and prepare for his execution. Although spared death, he was stripped of his titles and reduced to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 在曹洪将被曹丕处死时，卞太后出面干预，胁迫郭皇后向曹丕求情，最终使曹洪免于一死。
description.en: When Cao Hong was about to be executed by Cao Pi, Empress Dowager Bian intervened, forcing Empress Guo to plead with Cao Pi, ultimately saving Cao Hong's life.

description.zh-cn: 在卞太后的胁迫下，郭皇后尽力为曹洪周旋求情，使其免死。
description.en: Under pressure from Empress Dowager Bian, Empress Guo interceded on Cao Hong's behalf, saving him from execution.

description.zh-cn: 曹叡即位后，恢复了曹洪的名誉和爵位。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Cao Rui restored Cao Hong's reputation and titles.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战后的庆功宴上，杨阜因曹洪令女倡跳脱衣舞而厉声谴责他。
description.en: At a celebratory banquet after the Hanzhong Campaign, Yang Fu harshly condemned Cao Hong for making female entertainers perform a striptease.

description.zh-cn: 长社令杨沛不畏权贵，惩治了曹洪在县界内犯法的宾客。
description.en: Yang Pei, the Prefect of Changshe, defied the powerful by punishing Cao Hong's retainers who broke the law within his jurisdiction.

description.zh-cn: 许令满宠不听曹洪求情，依法处置了其犯法的宾客。
description.en: Man Chong, the Prefect of Xu, ignored Cao Hong's pleas and dealt with his law-breaking retainers according to the law.

description.zh-cn: 阮瑀拒绝了曹洪强迫其担任书记的要求。
description.en: Ruan Yu refused Cao Hong's forceful demand to serve as his secretary.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿耻于和曹洪来往，以生病为由拒绝了曹洪的邀请。
description.en: Sima Yi was ashamed to associate with Cao Hong and declined his invitation on the grounds of illness.

description.zh-cn: 因司马懿拒绝与自己来往，曹洪心生怨恨并向曹操告状。
description.en: Because Sima Yi refused to associate with him, Cao Hong became resentful and reported him to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 在明帝时期，司马芝不顾卞太后传令，将参与淫祀的曹洪乳母下狱问罪。
description.en: During Emperor Ming's reign, Sima Zhi disregarded an order from Empress Dowager Bian and imprisoned Cao Hong's wet nurse for participating in illicit worship.
